content.rendered:
Thank you for your interest in working at Tradecast. For this vacancy, we’re looking for a native Dutch and English speaker. If you’re interested in replying to this job listing, please click here to visit the Dutch job listing on our website.

We are looking for a Senior Technical Project Manager for a key role in our team. With this position you will bridge the gap between our customers and supervise the technical execution of our product development. A challenge in which the ideal candidate can combine their knowledge of technology and platforms with their passion for project management and customer relations. Do you see yourself in this description? Then come make a difference at Tradecast.

What kind of company is Tradecast?
Tradecast is a combination of an innovative technology company and an experienced media and content agency. With Tradecast, we offer a complete custom online video platform – for web, mobile devices and apps – on which clients can broadcast and sell their video content in complete freedom and with full control. And with the Tradecast Agency – our in-house content and marketing agency – we help our clients with video issues in the broadest sense: from content production and live streaming solutions to video distribution strategies and optimal integrations of our software.

We have the ambition to be the complete solution for anyone who wants to get more out of their online video strategy. We pursue this goal with a team of over thirty experienced developers, media strategists, project managers, designers and content creators.

What is your role?
As our Senior Technical Project Manager, you represent the technical angle in conversations with (potential) clients. Together with the responsible project manager(s) and the Head of Sales & Marketing you will shape tightly designed video platforms which can do exactly what the customer expects. Based on your experience, you know better than anyone what the technical possibilities of the Tradecast platform are and how these features can best be used for each specific party. You can translate your technical knowledge into a clear strategy for a customer in a comprehensible and customer-friendly manner. You also enjoy sparring with clients and our managers about the best ways to make this translation.

More information?
Check out the job posting on the Dutch page of our website. We look forward to receiving your application.
